main event: A white light, bright as the moon, was observed descending toward the horizon over Cincinnati, Ohio in December 1957.
interesting points: The object was observed for 2-3 seconds before it just disappeared.
The report suggests the object was likely a meteor, as the Earth was entering the Geminids meteor shower at the time.
The object made no sound as it was observed.
sighted object: A white light, bright as the moon
